scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:symbols && npm run build:typescript && npm run build:copy-locales && npm run build:docs
scripts.prebuild:symbols: docker build --build-arg SRC_FOLDER=symbols --build-arg SCRIPT_FOLDER=bin --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=${NPM_TOKEN} --tag yr-weather-symbols-1 .
scripts.build:docs: npm run build:docs:build && npm run build:docs:copy-symbols && npm run build:docs:zip-symbols
scripts.build:docs:copy-symbols: cpy dist/symbols/lightmode/svg docs/symbols/lightmode && cpy dist/symbols/darkmode/svg docs/symbols/darkmode && cpy dist/symbols/shadows/svg docs/symbols/shadows && cpy dist/symbols/outline/svg docs/symbols/outline
